availability.p: This work is in the public domain in the United States

sourceDesc.p: Tall Tales is a repackaged version of Stupid, Stupid Rat-Tails: The Adventures of Big Johnson Bone, Frontier Hero. It also includes two new stories by Tom Sniegoski and one new story by Jeff Smith.

figure.desc: bone logo in top left corner

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Still no sign of the townspeople.
HEY! Ya hear that Phoney? Th’ coast is clear!
cbml:panel.note: all three talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Look at him! We got chased outta Boneville over two weeks ago, an’ he’s still mopin’ around!
cbml:panel.note: smiley talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: …Oh, well… I guess you can whine all you want, when yer th’ richest guy in th’ whole town.
Oops! Silly me. Ex-richest!
cbml:panel.note: smiley talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Don’t get him started.
They can’t do this to me! You can’t do anything to a rich person that he doesn’t want!
cbml:panel.note: phoney and fone bone talking

cbml:balloon.hi: GASP! OH! Th’ horrible injustice of it all! I’m still reeling with shock!!

cbml:panel.note: phoney talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I’m a respected community leader! A shining pillar of moral strength!
cbml:panel.note: phoney talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: …so a couple of shady business deals went sour…is that any reason to run th’ most beloved bone in Boneville out on a rail?!
cbml:panel.note: phoney talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Yes.
Beloved? Th’ mayor declared a school holiday just so th’ kids could come and throw rocks at you!
cbml:panel.note: fone bone and smiley talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ingrates! Oh, they’ll rue th’ day they chased PHONCIBLE P. BONE outta their crumb ol’ town! *sniff!*
cbml:panel.note: phoney talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Now, now, little buckaroo! Don’t be sad! It’s a beautiful day! There’s not a cloud in th’ sky!
cbml:panel.note: smiley talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Good point, Smiley. If we don’t find some shade soon, I’m gonna have a stroke!
Hey, I’m just tryin’ to cheer him up, okay?
cbml:panel.note: fone bone and smiley talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Try thinkin’ about somethin’ besides your money!
Take me for example! I never had a penny in my life!
cbml:panel.note: smiley talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: But I’m not sad! I got no responsibilities! I’m free! Free as a BIRD!
A Bird? More like a mangy, stray dog who doesn’t eat very often!
cbml:panel.note: smiley and phoney talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Well… true! But you get my point!
cbml:panel.note: smiley and phoney talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: What?
Have you figured out where we are, yet? What’s takin’ so long?
cbml:panel.note: phoney and fone bone talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I’m working on it. Hmmmm….That’s strange…that mountain range isn’t on any of my charts—
cbml:panel.note: fone bone talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hey - - !
Lemme see that!
cbml:panel.note: fone and phoney trying to look at the map

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Here's your problem Fone Bone! We're off the map! Get a bigger Map!
cbml:panel.note: phoney talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: That's as big as maps get! We're in uncharted territory!
Well get us back!
cbml:panel.note: talking about needing a better and bigger map

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I can't! We're lost!

cbml:balloon.hi: To boldly go where no bone has gone before!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Stick a sock in it, cabbage head!
cbml:panel.note: all three talking about being lost

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Don't get me wrong fone bone -- I'm grateful you were able to et me outta town -- but tell me ... why did you hafta go an' bring him with us?
cbml:panel.note: phoney is talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: To torture you.
Hey, Phoney! Bad news ... we're out of water!
cbml:panel.note: smilely drinks all the water

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Don't get mad at smily bone! This mess isn't his fault!
That's right! Th' townspeople aren't mad at us! They ran you outta town 'cause you're a selfish, little greedbag!
cbml:panel.note: smilely drinks all the water and phoney triesd to attack him

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I can't believe it! Not only am I broke -- now i'm gonna die broke! Gasp! Coff! Coff!
Oh, you're not gonna die! I just hope you learned your lesson!
cbml:panel.note: phoney thinking he is gonne die and be broke

cbml:balloon.hi: Water! I need water! I can feel my tongue crackling!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hey, cousins , look what I found! I think it's a map!
cbml:panel.note: phoney complaining about needing water

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Sure enough! Look! It's a map of that mountain range!
I'm saved! Give it to me!
cbml:panel.note: smiley "finding" a map and phoney thinking he is saved

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Gimme a dollar first.
What?
Go on, Phoney give him a dollar!
cbml:panel.note: arging over phoney giving smilely a dollar

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: We're lost in the middle of th' desert! Give him a dollar!
cbml:panel.note: smiley getting a dollar from phoney for the new map while fone bone agrees

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: All right, all right .... HEY! What is this? This looks like it was drawn by a five-year-old! This thing is worthless!
It's worth a dollar!
cbml:panel.note: phoney bone realizing the new map was drawn by smilely bone

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Let me go! I'm gonna kill him!

cbml:balloon.hi: Cousins! Heads up! We got company!

cbml:panel.note: Fone bone holding phoney bone back from trying to kill smilely bone

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Omigosh! It's the townspeople! Quick! Hide me!
shhhh! Wait a minutes!
You hear that?
cbml:panel.note: all three talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Smiley! What's that noise
Is it th' townspeople?
Nope. No People...
cbml:panel.note: all three talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Just locusts
Pretty neat, huh?
cbml:panel.note: the locusts are coming
FB and PB are running away from the swarm of locusts, SB is unfazed
All Bone cousins are running away from the locusts

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Phoney! Are you okay?
cbml:panel.note: FB jumps away, PB tumbles

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Whatever you do – don’t stick out your tongue! Pitt! Poo! Yuck!
cbml:panel.note: FB and PB are in the locusts swarms
close shot of locust swarm

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ptt! Ptt! Puh!
cbml:panel.note: All are still within the swarm of locusts
FB is still within the swarm of locusts, his legs are peaking out
FB finds himself running off a cliff
FB is falling, he lets go of the map
FB hits a part of the cliff
FB hits the ground made up of sand
FB lands face up in the sand
FB still in the sand, he looks up
FB still in the sand, he looks around

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Yeeee! I can’t believe I wasn’t just killed!
cbml:panel.note: FB runs from his landing spot

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Phoney! Smiley! Go back! Don’t come this way! It’s a cliff!
cbml:panel.note: FB shouts up to SB and PB

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: …maybe they’re already down here.
cbml:panel.note: FB is in a ravine

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: PHONEY BONE! SMILEY!
cbml:panel.note: FB is in a ravine, he is calling out to PB and SB

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: HEY!
Hey guys! I’m down in this gulley! Can you hear me?!!
cbml:panel.note: FB is still calling out to PB and SB, a cave is near him
FB is looking around, a pair of large eyes open from the cave

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: PHONEY– *gasp* Say! There’s that map!
cbml:panel.note: FB lays his eyes on the map

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Huh! I wonder if this really is a map of that mountain range…maybe I better hang on to it!
cbml:panel.note: FB is scanning the map, the pair of eyes are looming behind him

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I might need it to save Phoney Bone…
…again!
cbml:panel.note: FB is putting the map away grumply, the pair of eyes are staring at him

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hmmf.
I’m always gettin’ him outta trouble!
cbml:panel.note: FB is getting ready to climb the cliff

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Well, cousin or not…when we get back to Boneville, Phoney’s gonna have to face the music by himself!
cbml:panel.note: FB is climbing up the cliff

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I’ve had it! From now on, he can outrun angry mobs, an’ fall off cliffs without my help!
cbml:panel.note: FB is still climbing up the cliff

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: What kind of a patsy does he take me for?! *Urnf!
It’s always: “Fone Bone, you gotta save me!” or: “Fone Bone, you gotta help me!”
cbml:panel.note: FB is still climbing up the cliff

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Why, I oughta–
Hey! How’d I get so close to the mountains?!
cbml:panel.note: FB makes it to the top of the cliff, he is near the mountain range

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Where is everybody? Where’s th’ locusts?!
No way! I climbed up the wrong side! Phoney! Help!! You gotta save me!!
cbml:panel.note: FB climbs up the cliff, only to see he climbed up the wrong side

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oh, my gosh! They’re nowhere in sight!
cbml:panel.note: FB is scrambling around to find PB and SB
FB is calling out for PB
FB standing in shock
FB takes a pause
FB gasps, he sees something

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: A cigar butt!
cbml:panel.note: FB finds a cigarette butt

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Another one!
cbml:panel.note: FB finds another cigarette butt nearby

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Jeez…I hope Smiley doesn’t run out of cigars before I catch up to him
cbml:panel.note: FB is following a trail of cigarette butts
FB walks out of panel frame
The mysterious pair of eyes peek into frame, it seems to have long ears
FB is hiking up a mountain, the sun is setting
FB is panting from the hike

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Where th’ heck are those guys? We’re goin’ straight into th’ mountains
cbml:panel.note: FB is on the ground, clearly exhausted

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I hope I catch up to ‘em before it gets dark….
cbml:panel.note: FB is leaning against a rock, reading the map

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The last thing I want to do is spend the night out here by myself!
cbml:panel.note: FB is leaning against a rock, reading the map

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: …of course, after a day like today, it’s hard to imagine that anything worse could ….
cbml:panel.note: FB is yawning as he is leaning against a rock
FB is asleep, the day has turned to night and it is dark

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Light the torch…
cbml:panel.note: Two rat creatures are sitting in the dark, only their eyes are visible

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: …is it him? Is it the one we seek?
…I cannot tell...look for the star on its chest…
cbml:panel.note: Two rat creatures are looking at FB sleeping

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: …no star… this isn’t the one….
…nol...it is not he…..very well….kill it….it will be our supper
cbml:panel.note: The rat creatures are standing over FB, one of them is holding his arm

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Who’s gonna be your supper?
cbml:panel.note: The pair of eyes speaks up and scares the rat creatures

cbml:balloon.hi: Do not meddle in affairs that are too big for you, boy!

cbml:panel.note: Two rat creatures are attempting to scare off the “pair of eyes”

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Who you callin’ boy?
cbml:panel.note: The Red Dragon appears, he is intimidating the rat creatures
FB opens his eyes, the rat creatures blown out torch is left in front of him
A thin line of smoke can be seen in the pitch blac

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oog…I must’ve fallen asleep. Where am I?
cbml:panel.note: FB is speaking in the pitch black

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You awake?
Huh? Who’s there?
cbml:panel.note: The Red Dragon and FB are talking in the pitch black

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You got a light?
Smiley? Is that you?
cbml:panel.note: The Red Dragon and FB are talking in the pitch black

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oh, boy, am I glad to see you! Hold on, I’ve got a match in my bag here!
cbml:panel.note: FB is rustling to get his lighter from his bag
Fonebone lights a match
Once the match is lit they meet face to face.
Both sit in the dark in silence
Fonebone screams after seeing the Red Dragon

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Thanks for th' light.
Don't mention it!
cbml:panel.note: red dragon thanks fonebone for the light
they sit in the complete pitch black again
fonebone lights another match

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hello?
Hello?
cbml:panel.note: fonebone is looking for the red dragon

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oh, man! I gotta quit goin' to sleep on an empty stomach!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone is complaining about being hungry when going to sleep
fonebone is wrapped in a blanket
fonebone is packing up and sees a map on the ground
fonebone is walking away
fonebone climbing rocks
fonebone looking up rocks with map in hand
fonebone jumped from cliff to cliff
fonebone sits under rock to rest
fonebone looks down a tall cliff
fonebone walking on the ground surounded by boulders
fonebone walking on the ground surounded by boulders

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oh, man! this ain't gonna cut it!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone was struggling

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I actually thought this map would take me through th' mountains to this waterfall on here...
cbml:panel.note: fonebone was thinking the map would be helpful

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ...but if this thing were real, I would've come to th' pass by now! Errr! I'm so stupid! I bet this map was just one of smiley's pranks - - and I fell for it!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone thinking the map is just smileys prank and he fell for it

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: And to top it off, I haven't seen any more cigar butts all day... How do I get myself into these things?
cbml:panel.note: fonebone struggling to keep walking and being down on himself

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Oh, well... I'll find those guys sooner or later... If I don't die of thirst...
cbml:panel.note: fonebone dying of thrist still searching for his cousins

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Until then, I just gotta keep movin'! Keep...
cbml:panel.note: fonebone struggling to keep walking
fonebone looking out over cliff
fonebone looks over a valley of greenery from the cliff

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Cool.
I made it!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone is happy to have made it through the cliffs to the greenery

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: That stupid map was right! Yessiree, Bob! There's water on th' menu tonight!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone heading down the cliff to the waterfall dreaming of having water for dinner

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I could kiss smiley bone for finding that map!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone is happy with smiley finding the map

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I might even kiss phoney right before I strangle him!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone is happy but could still kill phoney

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: And look! one of smiley's cigar stubs!
Hey! Watch it! you almost stepped on me!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone sees another cigar butt and almost steps on tedted

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Whoops! hello! what are you supposed to be?
I'm ted! I'm a bug!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone and tedted have their first conversation

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You look more like a leaf!
A leaf?! that's a insult! where's my big brother?
cbml:panel.note: fonebone thinks tedted looks more like a leaf than a bug

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hey, hold on! I didn't mean any harm! besides, what could your big brother do to me?
cbml:panel.note: fonebone is mocking tedted's older brother about what could he do to him

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: whoa.
is you pickin' on ted?
cbml:panel.note: tedted's older brother comes in sizing up to fonebone

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I - - just said he looks like a leaf!
what are you? a trouble-maker we don't need your kind in our valley!
I guess he didn't mean no harm, big brother! you don't has to hit him if you don't want!
cbml:panel.note: tedted's older brother is threating fonebone and tedted is trying to talk him down

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: listen too him! listen too him!
well, okay, ted, if you say so....
cbml:panel.note: fonebone begs tedted's older brother to listen to tedted and not hit him

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I'm not tryin' to casue trouble! I'm looking for my cousins! we got seperated an' now I'm lost! you wouldn't know how to get to boneville from here, would ya?
boneville? never heard of it...
cbml:panel.note: fonebone tells tedted's older brother about him looking for his cousins and that he is lost

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: But you better find it - - fast! it's autumn now, an' winter strikes quick in these parts... an' when it does nobody can get through those mountains... ...in or out!
cbml:panel.note: tedted's older brother is lecturing fonebone about winter coming and he better hurry

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: So I suggest you make your visit here a short one, or you'll be struck for th' winter. an' I don't think you wanna do that!
No, definitely not.
cbml:panel.note: tedted's older brother is lecturing fonebone about winter coming and he better hurry

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Good. I'll let ya go for now, since ted seems to like ya okay... but don't ferget! No Dawdlin'!
Thank you for not hitting me.
cbml:panel.note: tedted's older brother decides to not hit fonebone

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Don't worry 'bout him... He's actual a real nice guy!
Well... now we gotta figger out what ta do with ya... say! I know! I'll take ya to see thorn! C'mon! what's yer name, mister!
cbml:panel.note: tedted is talking about his brother being a nice guy and asking what fonebone's name is

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Fone Bone. So who's this thorn? He's not another big bug, is he?
Ho, Ho! No! thorn knows jes' about ever'thin' in th' whole world!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone and tedted are talking about thorn

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: But, listen, bone! Big brother was right about winter! she hits fast! 'n' if you wants ta git home you gotta do it before she snows!
Don't worry! I'm just gonna fine my cousins, an' then I'm outta here!
cbml:panel.note: tedted talks about the winter and fonebone says he just needs to find his cousins and he's good

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Where can I get something to drink? I’m dyin’ of thirst!
We can stop by th’ Barrelhaven! They brews th’ best stuff aroun’!
Eh?
cbml:panel.note: all three talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Comrade! We are about to feast! Quick! Get your fast carcass behind this bush and get ready!
cbml:panel.note: Rat Creature talking to Fone Bone

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hello, small mammal….could you step in here for a moment? I’ve got something to show you….
cbml:panel.note: Rat Creature talking to Fone Bone

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Can’t you show me out here where I’ve got runnin’ space?
No! No! Please! Step in here— your friend the dragon isn’t around, is he?
cbml:panel.note: Fone Bone and Rat Creature talking

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hey, Ted! Where you goin’?
You’re on yer own Bone!
Quick, Comrade! Start the cooking fire!
No. You called me fat.
cbml:panel.note: Two rat creatures talking with Fone Bone and Ted Ted

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ted! Wait for me!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone tries to run away from the rat creature

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: well, well... look who's joined us for supper... go start the cooking fire!!
no. you called me fat.
cbml:panel.note: fonebone is just being held by a rat creature while the two rat creatures argue

cbml:balloon.hi: No?!! What do you mean no?!!

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: and it's not the first time you've done it, either...
cbml:panel.note: the rat creatures argue as fonebone watches

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: comrade... be reasonable! I wasn't thinking... I was trying ot ctach our dinner... this isn't the time -- *sigh*
cbml:panel.note: the one rat creature is trying to apologize to the other for call them fat

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: i take it back.... you're not fat.
too late!
cbml:panel.note: rat creature is trying to apologize to the other for call them fat

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: please, comrade! I just want to chop him up for the stew!
And that's another thing! I'm tired of stew! I want to put him a crust and bake a light fluffy quiche!
cbml:panel.note: rat creatures talk about the way to eat fonebone

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Quiche?! what kind of food is that for a monster to eat?!...... listen, do you think tou could come back in half and hour? we'll have this straightened out by then!
cbml:panel.note: rat creatures ask fonebone if he will come back after they decide how to cook him
fonebone runs away

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: why didn't you stop me?
why should I? you're so smart!
cbml:panel.note: rat creatures argue

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ted!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone is running through the woods looking for tedted

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: c'mon, ted! where are you? you gotta take me to see thorn!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone looking for tedted

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: - - I'm sorry I called you a leaf!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone looking for tedted

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Whooooop! water! I hear water!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone hear water

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: water!
water! water!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone finds water

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: water! mmmm water! water! mmmm water! water! mmmmmm mm mm oh, man!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone gets a drink

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: what am I gonna do? what if I can't find my cousins before it snows? we could be trapped here for th' whole winter!
cbml:panel.note: fonebone is worried about not finding his cousins before it snows while laying against a tree

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I gotta get outta here! this forest is too weird for me! *rummmble*
cbml:panel.note: fonebone talks about getting out of the forest when his stomach rumbles
fonebone looks at the snow hovering over him
the snow falls on fonebone

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: case in point.
cbml:panel.note: the snow falls on fonebone
fonebone gathers stones and supplies to build shelter
fonebone has a fire and has a picnic some creatures
